list.description:
Mudrock from Arknights, universal sight.
Original image, Sketchup file and installation manual is in the zip file.
(Screenshot shown is captured by a 1920x1080 screen, on smaller resolutions the crosshair may intersect with the horns, I'll try to make it compatible with smaller screens in the near future.)

#anime #arknights #mudrock #universal_sight

WA2000 from Girls' Frontline for your Panther.
I made this for my Panther A, but it should be universal for all of them.
Original image, Sketchup file and installation manual is in the zip file.

#anime #panther_a #girls_frontline #wa2000

#anime #universal_sight
Hatsune Miku request by @Tornado_Matty01

Universal vehicle sight
Simplified Chinese：https://www.bilibili.com/read/cv13373810
This is a sight I made for myself.
In order to meet the purpose of can be used on all vehicles,
I haven't made many changes different from the official sight.
Differences

  • Change the sight line to green(0, 255, 0)all the time
  • A graffiti was added to the upper right of the sight bead
  • When you adjust the rangefinder, the fish hairpin will rotate

Panther A

Simple sb sight for Panther A. Dots left from 100 is for 200,400,600,800 distances.

Tiger 1 H1

Tiger 1 H1 simple sb sight( Pzgr, PzGr39 shell), dots for distances left from 100 is 200, 400, 600, 800 distances

#challenger #challenger2 #challengerii #challenger_2 #challenger22f #challenger2tes #challenger2bn #challenger2e #challenger2oes #challenger3 #greatbritain #great_britain #uk #historical #semihistorical #sights #reticles

This is the TCP_GPS & GAS sight of the Challenger 2 tanks.

Optimized for laser rangefinder, it is designed to be close to the historical sight.

If you have Stock Grind, I recommend using a GAS sight

Added a secondary hitpoint for close combat from 150m to 50m In Simulator Sight for those using the Tank Gunner sight setup.
At a distance of 200...

With @Roxy_Migurdia_ 's help, it took me several hours to learn how to make this sight.

Fortunately, I learned it. It looks good

The original painting comes from my friend

This sight have only one size and may block the line of sight on some vehicles ( >= x8)

#sight #t_54 #t_54_1947 #t_54_1949 #t_54_1951 #t54 #t54_1947 #t54_1949 #t54_1951 #t54_47 #t54_49 #t54_51
Gunsight for all T-54s (1947, 1949, 1951). I didn't really like the old T-54 sight ever since I made it, and it took me a while to force myself into making a new one. But I managed to, so here it is

Standardly, there are distance lines for the BR-412 APCBC shell and coaxial MG. For 1949, the 3BM-8 APDS shell is added, and for 1951, this and the 3BK-5 HEATFS shell is added. There's also a stadimetric rangefinder optimized for 2.7 meters and going up to 2000 meters distance. The stadimetr...

#sight #leclerc #leclerc_s1 #leclercs1 #leclercs2 #leclercserie2 #leclerc_s2 #leclerc_serie2 #semihistorical #semi_historical
[UPDATE 09/10/2021 - fixed translations & fixed misaligned 1000m ballistics of KE shells]
Gunsight for Leclerc S1 and S2. With wild imagination you can consider it a combination of Leclerc's historical gunsight and Abrams' historical gunsight
Requested by @SIRLINK

NOTE : The sight was made with Leopard 2PL, which has the same sight view as Leclercs (Zoom 4.0-12.0x and FOV 19°-6°) and subsequently only the ballistics parameters were changed to fit the Lecle...

#sight #vickers #vickers_mbt #vickersmbt #vickers_mbt_mk_1 #requested
[UPDATE 09/10/2021 - inscriptions can now be illuminated]
Gunsight for the Vickers MBT Mk. 1
Requested by @usesrnaiyme

NOTE : since I don't have the Vickers MBT yet, I coded the gunsight with Charioteer Mk. 7, which has the same sight view as the Vickers Mk. 1 (zoom 4.9-6.0x and FOV 15°-12°) and then just changed the shell ballistics to fit the Vicker's ammunition. Although the sight should work perfectly fine with the Vickers, I can't 100% grant it

Sight works with the "no gun correction" settings, which mea...

#sight #sta_1 #sta1 #sta #st_a1 #st_a2 #sniper
[UPDATE 18/06/2022 - fixed misalignments & inscriptions can now be illuminated]
[IMPORTANT!]The code files MUST be located in "all_tanks" folder
Gunsight for the ST-A1 and ST-A2. When it comes to the ST-As, you mostly hear that they are excellent for sniping, so here is a gunsight relatively inspired in duplex crosshair scope for firearms

The distance lines on the left set distance for the M62 APCBC shell, the ones on the right set it for the M348 HEATFS shell.
Two sight illumination colors can be chosen, either bright red or ...

#sight #amx_13 #amx13 #amx_13_75 #amx13fl11 #requested
[UPDATE 09/10/2021 - inscriptions can now be illuminated]
Radial gunsights for the AMX-13 FL11 and AMX-13/75
Requested by @SIRLINK

With FL11, the outer distance arc (with circles) sets distance for APCBC shell (M61), the inner one (with lines) sets distance for HE shell (75 mm HE) (yes that's literally the name of the shell). Same system goes for the long 75mm, i. e. outer arc sets for APCBC and the inner sets for HE

FL11's gunsight is bright greeen when illuminated, long 75's is white

i finally learned how to import images into sketchup with a tiny bit of loss of quality (if you want to know how just ask me in the comments), hence an improvement in the final design though there are A LOT of detail missing because of the funny line limit (ie PSO-1 on the actual gun)

6 hours to make this, this made me want to game end myself more than grinding the crafting event

Holo sits on your crosshair

#holo #spiceandwolf #anime #alltanks

Update: Added new sights for different Zoom options, SKP files and adjusted sight for better visuals.

There are 3 .blk files in this zip. These are for different Zoom multipliers. One for roughly ~3x, one for ~8x and one for ~15x Zoom.
There are also 3 SKP files for these Zoom options if you want to make some changes.

How to install this sight:
1) In War Thunder choose your Tank where you want to use this sight and go into test drive
2) in the menu open Options -> Common Battle Settings
3) Select "Add a grid sight...
Fictional #type74 sight for the E/F
Fictional M60A2 sight 1 Radial and 1 normal

Hana Isuzu V2 sight

For all Abrams variants

Ease the grind by having Hana by your side!

This is an improved version of my previous sight. I initially made this for personal use but decided to share it anyway.

Enjoy!

#sight #girls_und_panzer #girlsundpanzer #isuzu_hana #abrams #anime

Fictional modern MBT/IFV sight


Hello everyone,

I have made this fictional modern MBT/IFV sight.
This sight was inspired by multiple modern sights aswell as from games like Battlefield 3/4.

The zip file includes the following:
- Universal MBT Sight, picture 5
- Universal IFV Sight, picture 7

- MBT Sights with text, picture 1/2/3/4*
- IFV Sights with text, picture 6*

*Current vehicles available with text-sights:

USA:
- M1 Abrams (Any)
- M60A3 TTS
- Merkava Mk.3D
- M1128 Stryker
- M3A3 Bradley
- XM-1

GER:
- Leopard 2 (Any)
- Wiesel...

Smug Holo watches you miss all your shots.

#holo #spiceandwolf #anime #alltanks


How to install this sight:
1) In War Thunder choose your Tank where you want to use this sight and go into test drive
2) in the menu open Options -> Common Battle Settings
3) Select "Add a grid sight" under "Use alternative sight grid" (remember the new folder name that is displayed. If you select it in for example the Type 16 it will be named jp_type_16)
4) Extract this zip file and copy the .blk files from the Sights folder
5) In your SteamLibrary folder go to War Thunder, then UserSights and open ...

list.description:
[Fixed!] Sight but GawrGura
updated

for every ground vehicles


Due to this is my first User made sight, the quality might be not good.

How to install(manual install required)
1. Extract the ZIP file
2. copy-paste blk file to the Warthunder game folder - Usersights - all_sights

導入方法
圧縮ファイルを解凍後、.blkファイルをWarthunderゲームフォルダー内のUsersights - all_sightsに移動してください。
詳しくは下記のURLをご参考ください。

https://wiki.warthunder.com/index.php?title=User-made_sighting_reticles#How_to_setup_a_user-made_sight


Source of Original Art: https://youtu.be/da_LnL...
